annotation.spannedText: Evaluate for abscess/fluid collection and drain position.

classMention.mentionClass: Evaluate for abscess/fluid collection and drain position.

annotation.spannedText: Evaluate for abscess/fluid collection and drain position.

classMention.mentionClass: Evaluate for abscess/fluid collection and drain position.

annotation.spannedText: Multiloculated communicating fluid collections in GB fossa (w/ Surgicel), perihepatic space, and R abd/pelvis

classMention.mentionClass: Multiloculated communicating fluid collections in GB fossa (w/ Surgicel), perihepatic space, and R abd/pelvis

annotation.spannedText: R rectus abdominis edema and small IM fluid collections, cannot r/o infx.

classMention.mentionClass: R rectus abdominis edema and small IM fluid collections, cannot r/o infx.

annotation.spannedText: Multiloculated fluid collections in GB fossa, perihepatic space, and R abd/pelvis, with characteristics concerning for superinfx.

classMention.mentionClass: Multiloculated fluid collections in GB fossa, perihepatic space, and R abd/pelvis, with characteristics concerning for superinfx.

annotation.spannedText: R rectus abdominis edema and small IM fluid collections, cannot r/o infx.

classMention.mentionClass: R rectus abdominis edema and small IM fluid collections, cannot r/o infx.

annotation.spannedText: 82-year-old male with acute on chronic cholecystitis, complicated by gallbladder perforation with biloma and subhepatic abscess.

classMention.mentionClass: 82-year-old male with acute on chronic cholecystitis, complicated by gallbladder perforation with biloma and subhepatic abscess.

annotation.spannedText: Underwent open cholecystectomy, abscess drainage, and drain placement on .

classMention.mentionClass: Underwent open cholecystectomy, abscess drainage, and drain placement on .

annotation.spannedText: In the gallbladder fossa, there is a relatively well-circumscribed, intermediate-density fluid collection measuring -4 cm AP x -3 cm TV x -0 SI, with internal air-fluid level and foci of low attenuation consistent with porous Surgicel packing material.

classMention.mentionClass: In the gallbladder fossa, there is a relatively well-circumscribed, intermediate-density fluid collection measuring -4 cm AP x -3 cm TV x -0 SI, with internal air-fluid level and foci of low attenuation consistent with porous Surgicel packing material.

annotation.spannedText: This appears to demonstrate faint peripheral rim enhancement, and is peripheral to several additional perihepatic and intraperitoneal fluid collections.

classMention.mentionClass: This appears to demonstrate faint peripheral rim enhancement, and is peripheral to several additional perihepatic and intraperitoneal fluid collections.

annotation.spannedText: The subcapsular fluid collection surrounding the right lobe of the liver is decreased in size and now measures up to 3 cm in maximum depth, previously -5 cm.

classMention.mentionClass: The subcapsular fluid collection surrounding the right lobe of the liver is decreased in size and now measures up to 3 cm in maximum depth, previously -5 cm.

annotation.spannedText: This collection and a contiguous posterior collection along the left paracolic gutter demonstrate well-circumscribed borders with rim hyperdensity suggestive of enhancement.

classMention.mentionClass: This collection and a contiguous posterior collection along the left paracolic gutter demonstrate well-circumscribed borders with rim hyperdensity suggestive of enhancement.

annotation.spannedText: More inferiorly, a loculated 5 cm TV x -8 cm AP x -7 cm SI collection is present in the right pelvis, separate from the catheter tract, without definite rim enhancement.

classMention.mentionClass: More inferiorly, a loculated 5 cm TV x -8 cm AP x -7 cm SI collection is present in the right pelvis, separate from the catheter tract, without definite rim enhancement.

annotation.spannedText: A focal intramuscular fluid collection in the right rectus abdominis measures -7 x -8 cm, with internal locules of gas.

classMention.mentionClass: A focal intramuscular fluid collection in the right rectus abdominis measures -7 x -8 cm, with internal locules of gas.

annotation.spannedText: The lateral drain courses along the right lateral abdominal wall, along the posterior margin of the dominant right abdominal fluid collection, and terminates at the inferior tip of the liver, at the periphery of the larger fluid collection.

classMention.mentionClass: The lateral drain courses along the right lateral abdominal wall, along the posterior margin of the dominant right abdominal fluid collection, and terminates at the inferior tip of the liver, at the periphery of the larger fluid collection.

annotation.spannedText: The medial drain courses anteriorly and superiorly through the center of the abdominal collection, then curves medially through the subcapsular hepatic fluid collection, with tip at the hepatic dome.

classMention.mentionClass: The medial drain courses anteriorly and superiorly through the center of the abdominal collection, then curves medially through the subcapsular hepatic fluid collection, with tip at the hepatic dome.

annotation.spannedText: The appendix is completely filled with enteric contrast and measures 6 mm, with mild reactive wall thickening of the posterior wall adjacent to the pelvic fluid collection.

classMention.mentionClass: The appendix is completely filled with enteric contrast and measures 6 mm, with mild reactive wall thickening of the posterior wall adjacent to the pelvic fluid collection.

annotation.spannedText: Mild reactive thickening is also noted at the lateral margin of the ascending colon, adjacent to the abdominal fluid collection.

classMention.mentionClass: Mild reactive thickening is also noted at the lateral margin of the ascending colon, adjacent to the abdominal fluid collection.

annotation.spannedText: Interval open cholecystectomy with multiloculated gallbladder fossa, perihepatic, and right abdominopelvic fluid collections, some of which demonstrate characteristics concerning for infection and/or hemorrhage.

classMention.mentionClass: Interval open cholecystectomy with multiloculated gallbladder fossa, perihepatic, and right abdominopelvic fluid collections, some of which demonstrate characteristics concerning for infection and/or hemorrhage.

annotation.spannedText: drains are located peripherally within some loculations of the perihepatic collections, but the subhepatic collection does not appear to be drained by the surgical drains.

classMention.mentionClass: drains are located peripherally within some loculations of the perihepatic collections, but the subhepatic collection does not appear to be drained by the surgical drains.

annotation.spannedText: Small right rectus abdominis collection along the surgical incision, gas containing, cannot exclude superinfection.

classMention.mentionClass: Small right rectus abdominis collection along the surgical incision, gas containing, cannot exclude superinfection.

annotation.spannedText: CT

classMention.mentionClass: CT

annotation.spannedText: malpositioned drains, which course through collections, but tips end outside at hepatic dome and inferior liver tip.

classMention.mentionClass: malpositioned drains, which course through collections, but tips end outside at hepatic dome and inferior liver tip.

annotation.spannedText: the liver parenchyma appears slightly heterogeneous, likely due to hyperemia about the adjacent collections.

classMention.mentionClass: the liver parenchyma appears slightly heterogeneous, likely due to hyperemia about the adjacent collections.
